mapper.select: select * from board order by bo_num
mapper.insert: insert into post(po_title, po_content, po_me_id, po_bo_num) values(#{post.po_title}, #{post.po_content}, #{post.po_me_id}, #{post.po_bo_num})
mapper.select: select post.*, bo_name as po_bo_name from post join board on po_bo_num = bo_num where po_num = #{po_num} and po_del = "N"
mapper.update: update post set po_del = "Y" where po_num = #{po_num}
update post set po_view = po_view + 1 where po_num = #{po_num}
